title: Amid Covid divisions, world leaders call for pandemic treaty to fight future emergencies
content:
1. Amid Covid divisions, world leaders call for pandemic treaty to fight future emergencies  NBC News
  2. World leaders call for pandemic treaty  CBC News
  3. World leaders unite to call for pandemic treaty, saying: 'No one is safe until we are all safe'  CNN
  4. Covid-19 shows united action is needed for more robust int'l health architecture  The Phnom Penh Post
  5. Covid-19: Uhuru, World leaders call for international pandemic treaty  The Star, Kenya
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 在科维德分裂的情况下，世界各国领导人呼吁签订大流行病条约，以应对未来的紧急情况。
在科維德分裂的情況下，世界各國領導人呼籲簽訂大流行病條約，以應對未來的緊急情況。
